__**Available Commands:**__
__Bot Info/Management:__
**!ping**: Checks the bot's ping to the Discord server.
**!help**: Lists all the commands.
**!credits**: Outputs the credits for the bot.
**!stats**: Displays information about the bot.
**!nameset**: Sets the nickname of the bot.
**!invite**: Outputs the invite link for the bot.
**!messages**: Outputs the number of messages the bot has sent.
**!github**: Outputs the link to the bot's GitHub repository
__Utility:__
**!calc** `math expression`: Evaluates a math expression. (Does not work with exponents)
**!id**: Tells you your Discord ID number.
**!addrole `role name`**: Gives a role to you.
**!removerole `role`**: Removes a role from you.
**!eval**: Evalutes JavaScript code. ONLY WORKS FOR THE BOT'S OWNER
**!define**: Defines a word using a proper dictionary
**!hug**: Gives you a hug.
**!choose `choice|choice2|choice3|etc.`**: Randomly chooses one of the provided choices
**!urban `word/phrase`**: Define a word or phrase via Urban Dictionary
**!moe:** Outputs a random moe picture
**!mee6**: Outputs the link to the server's mee6 leaderboard.
**!tadaima**: Welcomes you back home.
**!roll `number of dice` d `dice type`**: Rolls `number of dice` dice which each have a max value of `die type` (Ex. `1d20` rolls 1 dice with a max value of 20)
__Fantasy War Tactics R:__
**!trivia**: Starts a round of Fantasy War Tactics R Trivia
**!rank `@user`**: Finds the trivia score and rank of the mentioned user. If no user is mentioned, finds your score and rank.
**!highscores**: Lists the top 10 leaderboard of Fantasy War Tactics R Trivia
**!pull**: Randomly chooses between pull and don't pull
**!whale `number`**: Simulates a 10x pull `number` of times. Assumes `1` if no number is entered
**!effect `effect`**: Lists all heroes who can inflict the effect. `list` will list available effects.
**!property `property type` `property`**: Lists all heroes who have the property. (Ex. `type` `attack` finds all attack type heroes)
**!item `item name` `slot` `rareness`**: Finds the max transcendence stats for an item (Ex. <bow> <V> <6> finds the +15 stats of a slot V 6* bow)
**!stats `hero alias`**: Finds the base stats of a hero at 5* or Awakened lvl 70
**!stat `hero alias` `stat`**: Finds a base stat of a hero at 5* or Awakened lvl 70 (Ex. `celes` `attack` finds Celestial's base attack)
**!statrank `stat` `limit`**: Finds the top `limit` highest heroes for a base stat (Ex. `hp` `5` would find the top 5 highest base HP heroes

**!compare `stat` `hero alias` `hero alias` `etc.`**: Finds a stat for all requested heroes. There can be an infinite number of requested heroes. (Ex. `attack` `celes` `chris` finds the base attack of Celestial and Chris)
**!skills `hero alias`**: Lists the skills of a hero.
**!skill `hero alias` `skill number`**: Finds the information for a hero's skill. (Ex. `celes` `3` finds the description and range for Celestial's 3rd skill)
**!sets `slot` `rareness`**: Lists all sets at a slot and rareness. (Ex. `IV` `6` lists all the 6* sets at slot IV)
**!set `set alias`**: Finds a set's information.
**!sg `hero alias`**: Finds the soul gear and hero mark information for a hero.
**!birthday `hero alias`**: Finds a hero's birthday date.
\*\***All about A Certain Magical Bot!**\*\*
